Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace Ward  3
Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace Ward  6
Hospital Service Dist.#2 -- Lease Value Assets - BOC - 25 Yrs.(Renew 24Y)
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 2

Summary:  Authorization for Hospital Service District No. 2 of the Parish of St. Martin, State of Louisiana, to lease at fair market value all of the assets of the District, known as St. Martin Hospital for an initial term of 25 years with an option to renew for 24 years to Lafayette General Medical Center ("LGMC") a non-profit corporation organized and existing under and by virtue of the laws of the State of Louisiana (a 501(C)(3) corporation); and under the terms of a triple net lease LGMC will pay to the District a rental in an amount not less than $286,000 annually, which money shall be first used to pay the debt service on the District's outstanding bonds or other debt obligations; the form of which lease is on file with the District and is available for public inspection at St. Martin Hospital, Breaux Bridge, Louisiana.
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 2 of the Parish of St. Martin, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to lease at fair market value all of the assets of the District for an initial term of twenty-five (25) years with an option to renew for 24 years to Lafayette General Medical Center ("LGMC"), a non-profit corporation organized and existing under and by virtue of the laws of the State of Louisiana (a 501(C)(3) corporation) and under the terms of a Triple Net Lease LGMC will pay to the District a rental in an amount not less than $286,000 annually, which money shall be first used to pay the debt service on the District's outstanding bonds or other debt obligations; the form of which lease is on file with the District and is available for public inspection at St. Martin Hospital, Breaux Bridge, Louisiana?
